title: Add embedded device settings fallback to terraphim-cli
description: Evaluate and implement an embedded DeviceSettings fallback (similar to terraphim-agent) so terraphim-cli doesn't fail on missing settings.

title: Clarify terraphim-agent TUI offline/server requirement
description: Determine whether terraphim-agent TUI is expected to work fully offline or requires a running server; document requirement and adjust behavior if needed.

title: Define required feature parity between terraphim-agent and terraphim-cli
description: Decide which commands/features must exist in both CLIs and document any intentional gaps for automation vs interactive use.
